Articles.Content:
So, this has nothing to do with the mechanics of the gear, per se.  But I noticed when attaching these to my craft in the SPH using symmetry, the gear on the opposite side of the aircraft have their fairings facing the wrong way.  I tried playing around with it, but it seems like if the fairings are facing forward on the left side of the plane, they're facing backwards on the right side.

I'll try to grab a screen shot later, I've had enough KSP for today.
